title: [K-12] Strengthening Academic Writing Competencies with Generative AI Support

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of basic academic writing structures and smartphone utilization skills
context.additional_context: Project-based learning applying generative AI tools to actual academic writing tasks in smartphone-based learning environments with limited technology

learning_goals: Learners can systematically design three or more stages (planning-drafting-revision) of the academic writing process using generative AI tools.
Learners enhance critical analysis skills by applying at least five criteria to evaluate the academic suitability of AI-generated content.

Learners can establish a writing time management plan (2 weekly 30-minute sessions) and resource utilization checklist (topic selection/data collection/first draft) using three or more AI tools (e.g., Grammarly, Notion AI) in mobile environments, achieving over 80% execution rates for four weeks.

resources: AI-Human Collaboration Case Study Videos (5-Minute Segments)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
